# KURA PAK Tool - Android

Android app for unpacking PAK and UAsset files directly on your phone.

## Features
- ğŸ“¦ Unpack .pak files
- ğŸ“„ Analyze .uasset/.uexp files  
- ğŸ“ Browse Downloads folder
- ğŸ“Š Progress tracking
- ğŸ“ Detailed logs

## Installation
1. Download APK from Releases
2. Allow "Install from unknown sources"
3. Install and grant storage permissions

## Usage
1. Open app
2. Select .pak or .uasset file from Downloads
3. Click "Unpack"
4. Check UNPACK folder for extracted files

## Build Your Own APK
```bash
pip install buildozer
buildozer android debug
